title: BRIEF-S&P Says Nigeria 'B/B' And 'Nga/Nga-1' Ratings Affirmed Outlook Stable
text:
BRIEF-S&P Says Nigeria 'B/B' And 'Nga/Nga-1' Ratings Affirmed Outlook Stable

Stock Markets 3 hours ago (Sep 14, 2019 00:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-S&P Says Nigeria 'B/B' And 'Nga/Nga-1' Ratings Affirmed Outlook Stable Sept 13 (Reuters) - * S&P SAYS NIGERIA 'B/B' AND 'NGA/NGA-1' RATINGS AFFIRMED; OUTLOOK STABLE * S&P SAYS VIEW NIGERIAN GOVERNMENT INSTITUTIONS AS RELATIVELY WEAK, WITH SLOW DECISION-MAKING ON POLICY ISSUES * S&P SAYS NIGERIA'S ECONOMIC GROWTH REMAINS WEAK, SLOWER THAT OF PEERS AT A SIMILAR RATING LEVEL Source text: (https://

BRIEF-S&P Says Nigeria 'B/B' And 'Nga/Nga-1' Ratings Affirmed Outlook Stable
